localString.value: This token is good for passage by ship to the city of Fakualt on the island of Kabu.
A strange crystal that hums and glows towers out of the ground and seems to eminate the very powers of the world itself.
Place this object in any area where you want tracking to occur. Set Will to the DC of tracking in this area.

You look into the crystal and see an image of the world from far up in the sky. It starts to swirl and shake until the whole world is consumed by flames and darkness. Then suddenly there is a flash of bright light and everything is as it was...
